description:
**Four-Causal Correction**
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> When Alhaitham's Charged or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, they will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.
**Mysteries Laid Bare**
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> Each point of Alhaitham's Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Projection Attacks and Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 0.12%.
The maximum DMG increase for both these abilities is 100%.
**Law of Reductive Overdetermination**
*Unlocked Automatically*
> When Alhaitham crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.
title: Alhaitham | Passive Talents
